body.html:
replace subject with: FSF Boot Camp - Tutor Available

[Invite student to `Tutors & Students` slack right now]


Hello [firstName],

My name is Sam, nice to e-meet you!

I am assigned to be your tutor for the duration of the Bootcamp.

I am a Web Developer and fellow Bootcamp graduate, I understand the challenges you may be facing!



1. I just sent an invite to our Tutors & Students Slack Workspace.

  • This is a separate Slack Workspace (not a channel in your class Workspace)
  • The Workspace will look empty, all communications are through direct message (DM) only.
  • Send me a DM @Samuel Fox to get connected
  • Have Slack available on your mobile to message me if there are computer issues (problems with wifi, etc.)
  • Please respond to this email if you don't see the invite or have issues getting connected


2. Meetings

  • Duration: 50 minutes
  • Part-time (6-month) Bootcamp: 1 per week
  • Full-time  (3-month) Bootcamp: 2 per week
  • a `week` is Monday-Sunday


3. Calendly Scheduling

  • Please confirm the correct time zone is selected!
  • https://calendly.com/samueljfox-2u/tutor-session


4. Scheduling Conflicts

  • If our availability doesn’t sync, let me know and I'll see if we can figure something out!


5. Pre-Session

  • I'll email you the Zoom.us link the day before our scheduled time.
  • If you have not used Zoom before, please join the meeting at least 15 minutes early as you may have to download & install some software.
  • Be on Slack 5 minutes before your time slot.
  • Make sure your computer/mic/internet connection is working.
  • Make sure your workspace is quiet and free from interruptions.


6. Post-Session

  • A link to a 2-minute evaluation form will be provided
  • You are required to complete this form.


DM on Slack or email me with any questions.

CC Central Support on all emails by always using REPLY ALL.


I look forward to our meeting!

Thanks,

Samuel Fox

sfox2@instructors.2u.com
